message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.ArrayList' import. Should be before 'pl.plajerlair.commonsbox.minecraft.compat.VersionUtils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Arrays' import. Should be before 'pl.plajerlair.commonsbox.minecraft.compat.VersionUtils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.List' import. Should be before 'pl.plajerlair.commonsbox.minecraft.compat.VersionUtils'.
WhitespaceAround: 'for' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
Each variable declaration must be in its own statement.
